questions.text: You see a triangular sign with a red border and an exclamation mark. What does it indicate?
questions.explanation: A red-bordered triangle with an exclamation mark is a general danger/warning sign.

questions.text: A circular blue sign with a white arrow pointing right means:
questions.explanation: Blue circular signs indicate mandatory directions; the arrow specifies the required direction.

questions.text: What does a red circle with a white horizontal bar (no entry) mean?

choices.text: No entry for all traffic from this direction

questions.explanation: The sign indicates no entry from this direction for all traffic.
